'''Mossy cobblestone stairs''' are a [[mossy cobblestone]] variant of [[stairs]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Mossy cobblestone stairs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row
|Mossy Cobblestone Stairs
|Pickaxe
|Wooden
|item=1
|link=none
|horizontal=1
}}

=== Natural generation ===
Mossy cobblestone stairs generate as part of [[pillager outpost]]s.

=== Crafting ===
